name: Decoder
desc: A type that can decode values from a native format into in-memory representations.

items.name: var codingPath: [CodingKey]
items.desc: The path of coding keys taken to get to this point in decoding.

items.name: var userInfo: [CodingUserInfoKey : Any]
items.desc: Any contextual information set by the user for decoding.

items.name: func container<Key>(keyedBy: Key.Type) -> KeyedDecodingContainer<Key>
items.desc: Returns the data stored in this decoder as represented in a container keyed by the given key type.

items.name: func singleValueContainer() -> SingleValueDecodingContainer
items.desc: Returns the data stored in this decoder as represented in a container appropriate for holding a single primitive value.

items.name: func unkeyedContainer() -> UnkeyedDecodingContainer
items.desc: Returns the data stored in this decoder as represented in a container appropriate for holding values with no keys.
